Posts.Content:
Hi,
I’m writing a story for Cancer and Careers.Org about
 Living With Cancer as a Chronic Disease and I’m looking for working people being treated for incurable but treatable cancers to interview about
 the challenges they face both in their personal and professional lives. For example, having to take time off from work for constant monitoring, coping with drug side effects and the mental stress of dealing with the reality that they may never be cured of their cancer.
If you are interested in being interviewed for the story, please e-mail me at (e-mail address deleted to protect the op) and give me a brief descript
ion of the type of cancer you have and some of your career concerns and I’ll contact you.
Thank you so much for your help.
Best,
Jo Cavallo
Posts.Title: Interview request for people living with cancer as a chronic disease
